divs: Sighting Detailsmy boyfriend went out to smoke and he ran upstairs to tell me to come outside and we saw a very bright starlike thing going very fast. normally we would hae thought it was a plain because we can hear it but there wasnt plus due to the fact it was super bright and the speed was not something thats normal. we watched it and then all of a sudden it disapeared.. it gave us both chills.
Summary: it was very bright and moving very fast then it disappeared. it gave us both chills
